title: P.B.E Accounts
body:
When i try to confirm i want to help testing and giving full feedback of content it don't stop loading and loading.
i _Really_ want to test the new stuff in League and give feedbacks , where i can  sign up for it , without ''Loading please wait'' - 3 hours of waiting - STILL LOADING...?
 Please do not Bot-answer me like - ,,Okay thank you for the reporting this bug , we will try our best''

replies.body: This happened to me as well and there seems to be a bug with the sign up page but If you log into the main LoL page for your region http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/ and then go back to the pbe sign up page it should let you sign up.

Hey Velizari76 - 

Could you be more specific on what's going on here? You're mentioning that you're getting loading screens, is this after you've attempted to sign up? Just want to make sure I'm understanding you correctly. 

If you could walk me through what you're doing before you get the endless loading screen, that'd be super helpful! :)
Every time i press i wan't to help , it starts the log-in screen , and it never loads , i tried to log in alone then press it , still the same log-in whtever i will just wants some brofresco :D

You do know this is the boards and not a support page right?
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us
